start: Hey {userName}, how may I help you?
hi: Hey {userName}, how may I help you?
hello: Hey {userName}, how may I help you?
hey: Hey {userName}, how may I help you?
hlo: Hey {userName}, how may I help you?
thanks: You're welcome, {userName}! Let me know if you need further assistance.
how_are_you: I'm doing great, {userName}! How can I assist you today?
what_is_your_name: I am your assistant, {userName}! How can I assist you today?
good_morning: Good morning, {userName}! How can I help you today?
good_afternoon: Good afternoon, {userName}! How can I help you today?
good_evening: Good evening, {userName}! How can I help you today?
good_night: Good night, {userName}! Sleep well and reach out whenever you need help.
whats_up: Hey {userName}, what's up? How can I assist you?
help: Sure, {userName}! What can I help you with today? You can check /list for options.
how_to: I'd be happy to help you learn, {userName}! What would you like to learn about?
default: I don't understand. Please check the command /list for available options.
non_text: I can only respond to text messages. Please send a text command.
